eventText: Mariona sends two home screen options to Sambhaji, Nilesh, @12 Feb, 6:13 PM

Sambhaji forwards and discusses the home screen options with modules team. Modules team suggests option 2. Sambhaji replies back to Mariona with option2. Also requests her to add Infoview icon in bottom navigation bar.
Nathalie suggests sponsor to be on home screen.
Mariona sends the design draft for approval to all teams, @13Feb, 6:08PM

Nathalie has replied on the design draft with branding changes. Sambhaji has asked Nathalie, whether this be a technical update to already existing Diabetes Mellitus Infopocket app or is it going to be a new app
Petra sends the DM Infopocket Cover   Links to Mariona
Mariona sends the updated design draft, @14Feb, 7:47PM
Modules team sends a feedback to Mariona. On home screen mini popup, downwards arrow is not possible.
Nathalie tell that the design draft will go to client first before sending DD to Pune. Also make changes from modules team.
Nilesh send the screenshot of Drop down to Mariona.
Mariona sends the updated DD, asks Bettina whether to kick out the secondary option.
Mariona sends us the updated design draft on 15Feb, 7:55 PM. Nilesh had a call with Mariona on 15Feb.
Nathalie says that this app version will be a completely new app. No update to existing app on appstore.
Nathalie sends two videos to show in the app. She needs a confirmation before 1:30PM on Monday.
Mariona asks whether we can apply the DIM font, @16Feb, 10:56PM. Modules programmers confirmed that DIN font can be used.
Sambhaji confirms that the two videos can be played in the Diabetes Infopocket app.
Sambhaji asked for the open files for starting app graphics. Also informed Bettina that we are taking the latest available data from CMS.
For Design draft, Mariona has added Disclaimer and waiting for approvals from Nathalie.
Mariona sends the design draft and open files of Diabetes Infopocket.
Nathalie asks Mariona to remove the sponsor slider from home screen.
Mariona removes the DocCheck and sponsor slider and resends the Design draft to team.
Bettina sends the home screens button clicks. Sambhaji sends his doubts to Bettina. Also contacts Akansha for tools.
Bettina clears the doubt. Bettina do not have the videos.
Nathalie clears that for the Kohlenhydrat section there will be NO videos. It will be pdfs.
Nilesh sends all the profiles related information to Harshit.
Sambhaji gave a demo to Nathalie @7Mar. Sambhaji sends all the changes to Harshit and Neville.
Disha asks Bettina for More Information button in footer. Whether to keep the button or remove it.
Sambhaji tells Rasika to adopt the Rechtliches sent by Nathalie in her email.
